Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, haven't been active as my life has been turned upside down but I'm back with things better than before! But I've been doing some thinking. I've always been a bit of a strategist and big into war history. Also love playing war games of any kind. SH4, HOI3 WoT, WT, and many more.

I've been thinking about making a website just for war gamers to connect and discuss different things. What do you all think? I don't know if anyone here would be interestd though,
